title: James Rhodes - Piano Man
description: James Rhodes' backstory is a dramatic one, certainly one not typical of a concert pianist. But with his passion and rock-star aura, he's bringing new audiences to classical piano. In Piano Man, he plays the music of his favorite composers, many of whom also led troubled lives. In this highly personal collection, James explains how they've given him solace in his darkest moments, and why we should all be listening. Piano Man is an exciting and radical new approach to classical Music.
